game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the village elder.
game.description: You've heard rumors of an artifact hidden deep in the ruins of a long-lost civilization. The village elder believes it holds great power and needs it to protect their people from an impending threat.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the gratitude of the village

task.description: You must find the coordinates or landmarks that lead to the ancient ruins where the artifact is believed to be hidden.
task.location: The Old Library in the Capital City

task.description: Watch out for traps and avoid any danger while entering the ruins to search for the artifact.
The artifact is said to be in a chamber deep within the ruins. Look for clues and solve any puzzles that stand in your way.
